Project Details
CVS Health (formerly CVS Caremark) (April 2014 – Till Date)

before final implementation.

systems (Rxclaims – claim processing) and Fazal (enrollment)

period (AEP).

PROJECT : United States Automobile Association (USAA)
The  current  Loan  Origination  System  which  is  a  desktop  application  coded  on  Progress  has  become

application to manage the flow of new Loan Origination System is also being designed and constructed to 
allow users to configure the system according to their needs and business requirements

HCL Technologies India ( June 2012  - December 2012)
PROJECT : Benefits Administration - Blue Cross Blue Shield, Texas
Health Exchanges (HIX) are being set up in accordance with the Patient Protection and Privacy Act. This 
requires  the  existing  plans  to  be  upgraded  and  new  plans  to  be  created  to  cater  to  the  health  exchange 
setup.
HCSC has acquired Hallmark Systems Corporation (HSC) and plans to consolidate all the plan data from 
HSC into the Product Repository at HCSC, so that the repository will be a single source of product data 
for both HSC and HCSC systems which will be used by HCSC Online Sales Channel to sell the plans to 
the prospective health exchange customers.

Role : Sr. Business Analyst
●The undersigned is working as a Business Analyst on benefits administration.
●Responsible  for  creating  the  Requirement  document  detailing  the  project  scope,  stakeholders, 
business  process  and  the  business  objective  with  the  help  of  Use  Cases,  Data  Flow  diagrams, 
Interface diagrams, transition diagrams and business process diagrams
●Responsible  for  analyzing  and  comparing  the  existing  plans  at  HSC  and  HCSC,  mapping  the 
existing  database  fields  of  HSC  plan  tables  to  existing  plan  tables  of  HCSC  and  working  on 
migrating the HSC data into HCSC tables.
●Responsible for end to end implementation of the project.
●Working  on  web  front  end  modules  for  online  product  information,  enrollment  and  benefits 
management.
●Direct interaction with the business to understand and gather the requirements and preparation of 
business requirement document.

HCL Technologies ( December 2010 – June 2012)
PROJECT : Emptoris ( Provider Contract Management System) – United Health Group
Emptoris  is  the  predominant  Provider  Contract  Management  Tool  available  in  the  market.  It  is  used  for 
automating the contracts that a Payor enterprise enters into, with the providers.  It is a full scale, thorough

automating the contracts that a Payor enterprise enters into, with the providers.  It is a full scale, thorough 
product  managing  every  aspect  of  provider  contracts  ranging  from  drafting  a  contract  to  the  final 
execution  of  the  contract  which  takes  into  account  the  relevant  factors  as  state  laws,  fee  structure, 
provider specialties, provider groups, pre-defined clauses, alternate clauses and so on.

Role : Sr. Business-Systems Analyst
Responsibilities : 
●The undersigned is working as a Sr. Business /System Analyst on the Provider Contract 
Management System – Emptoris and provider repository - NDB
●Responsible for direct client interactions for requirements gathering, understanding the 
requirements and preparation of Business Requirement document.
●Responsible for clarifying unclear or ambiguous requirements by having multiple meetings 
with the business based on discussions/meetings with the clients.
●As a System Analyst, the undersigned is also responsible for writing the Technical Design 
documents.
●Development of flow charts, Visio flows to include them in the Technical Design document to 
clarify the approach and requirements.
●Conducting walkthroughs with the business, development and QA teams to bring them on a 
common platform and guiding them throughout the life cycle of the project.

●Conducting walkthroughs with the business, development and QA teams to bring them on a 
common platform and guiding them throughout the life cycle of the project.
●Working as an interface between business, development and testing teams, striving to bring all 
on a common platform on the requirements and having walkthroughs for each to achieve the 
same.
●Mentoring the QA and the Development teams for successful implementation of the project
●Writing  test scenarios and test plans.
●Work   as   an   inteface   between   the   clients   and   the   technical   teams   for   the   successful          
implementation of the requirements..
●Providing technical and functional assistance to other team members.
Cognizant Technology Solutions ( July 2010 – December 2010 )
PROJECT : FACETS  4.71 upgrade
Facets   is   a   widely   acknowledged   Healthcare   product   used   by   for   Claims   Processing,   Billing,

PROJECT : FACETS  4.71 upgrade
Facets   is   a   widely   acknowledged   Healthcare   product   used   by   for   Claims   Processing,   Billing, 
Membership,  Provider-Management,  Accounts  Receivable,  Capitation,  Edi  etc.  Combined  with  its 
various ancillary sub – systems like NetworX, HIPAA gateway, MACESS, it becomes a powerful tool to 
handle every aspect of Healthcare and also the changes that are underway.
Role : Business Analyst / Application Specialist.
Responsibilities :

● The undersigned is currently serving as the Offshore Lead managing a team of 5.
● The project was a FACETS upgrade from 4.5 to 71. The undersigned is responsible for 
understanding  the  functional  requirements  and  analyzing  the  request  and  making  Business 
Requirement Documents.
● Worked as an interface between the client and technical team to clarify requirements
● Worked as an interface between various teams involved in the project.
● Communicating with the client if there is some clarification to be sought on the requirements and 
resolving them by proposing new/alternative solutions to achieve the end objective
● Wrote Oracle queries for development and testing purposes.
● Reviewed Test Case preparation and execution for flawless and efficient.
● Designed test cases for testing the impacted functionalities.
● Provided technical and functional assistance to other team members for the project.

Environment: H/w: HP 3000 O/s: MPE/iX S/w: COBOL, AMISYS

Amisys is a world renowned healthcare product which runs on the HP 3000 system. AMISYS runs on the 
HP  3000  platform  and  handles  all  the  major  PROVIDER  CLAIMS,  BILLING  and  administrative 
functions of a Healthcare Insurance company like Harvard Pilgrim Healthcare. The major functionalities 
of  Amisys  include  Benefits  Management,  Claims  Processing,  Billing  and  Accounts  receivable,  Pricing 
Management, Batch Processing, Provider Management and Pricing Management.
ROLE: Software Developer
